cleaned_text: Dr. Moon - Energy Healing Center Business Information [Dr. Moon - Energy Healing Center Website](http://www.energymedicinenewportbeach.com/moon/) (949) 833-8989 20301 SW Acacia St., Ste 100, Newport Beach, CA 92660 Hours of Operation: Monday 8:00 am - 6:00 pm Tuesday Closed Wednesday 8:00 am - 6:00 pm Thursday Closed Friday 8:00 am - 6:00 pm Saturday Closed Sunday Closed About the Business: At Energy Medicine Center, we offer the highest form of acupuncture by Dr. In E. Moon, a skilled practitioner in the field. We take pride in providing compassionate, personalized care through natural healing techniques that emphasize the body's long term health. Dr. Moon has been healing for over 40 years and is a respected teacher of newly developed natural healing methods.
